Tested RESTful Client Requests and Responses:

Functionality:
Find all perfect numbers

REQUEST:
----------
In HTTP:

GET /perfnum? HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
Content-Type: application/json

----------
In cURL:

curl --location --request GET 'http://localhost:8080/perfnum' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json'
